abstract: Rhapsody International, operator of Rhapsody and Napster streaming music services, reports it has surpassed three million paying subscribers globally.
lead_paragraph: Rhapsody International says it has surpassed three million paying subscribers globally, as more consumers realize the benefits of offline listening.

headline.main: Rhapsody Music Stream Service Surpasses 3 Million Subscribers
headline.print_headline: Rhapsody Music Stream Service Surpasses 3 Million Subscribers

snippet: Rhapsody International says it has surpassed three million paying subscribers globally, as more consumers realize the benefits of offline listening.
